title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-13.3 - Medical information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-13.3 - Medical information

State Regulations

All medical information solicited by or provided to the

Office for the purpose of determining a person's disability will be treated as
confidential, and this information must not be disclosed except as prescribed
by the regulations of the Secretary of the United States Department of Health
and Human Services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
398-13.3

Adopted by

New

York State Register September 24, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 38, eff. 10/1/2014. Amended

New

York State Register January 13, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 02, eff. 1/13/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
